Initial. Initiates when player approaches ceel that he is trapped in.
Dialog Mission Statement:
If Mission is in party then at the end of the dialog have Griff escape area and place him in Greeta's shop on Tatooine
If Mission is not in party player can threaten Griff (who attacks them), or the player can offer to take him to Mission. If this happens the entire party, Griff and Mission should all be jumped to the Tatooine star port just outside the Ebon Hawk. Griff will init dialog with Mission
